namuth ahambem me blog eke lipiya kiyawimata labunemi.mema lipiyehi athulath karunu 100% niwaradiya.muslim minusun weladamata metharam daksha ayi kiya sak sudak se pahadiliya.apekama sinhala kama kara uda thiyagena ape minissu apitama salakanne mehema nam minisum muslim minusunge kadawalata yama nathara nohakiya.banku wala wadakarana ewun hithagena inne puduma sahagatha dewalya.tayi kot nathnam satha pahakatawath ganan noganiyi.meya widesha ratawala hath pasinma wenasya.kanu adina minihatada garu nammbu di katha karayi.bohomayak salli karayo itha sara jiwithayak gathakarayi.boru sobana natha.ape ape ape kiya kochchara katha kalath wadak natha.yatharithaya katukaya.mema lipiya liyu obata thuthi.

sinhala bauddha ayithin wenuwen peni sitina bawa pawasana bodu bala sena sanwidhanaya pradhana lekam galabodaaththe nyanasara himiyan da nithara athi bhayanaka ‘wahabwadaya’ pilibanda wa sandahan karathi.

prerithayo da un wahanse samanga hindagathha. 15 un wahanse owunta katha kota, ”ma wada windimata palamuwen, me pasku bhojanaya oba samanga walandannata athishayin aasha wimi. 16 ee manda yi mama obata kiyami, dewiyan wahansege rajyaye di eya mudunpath wanathuru mama eya thawath nowalandami”yi wadala seka. 17 un wahanse kusalanak ganimin, thuthi puda, ”meya gena oba atharehi bedaganna. 18 manda, mama obata kiyami, methan patan, dewiyan wahansege rajyaya paminena thuru, mama midiyusa panaya no karannemi”yi wadala seka. 19 un wahanse roti gena thuthi puda, eewa kada, owunta di, ”oba udesa denu labana mage shariraya me ya; ma sihi kirima pinisa meya karanna”yi wadala seka. 20 elesa ma bhojanayen pasu kusalana di, ”me kusalana oba udesa waguruwanu labana mage rudhirayen kala nawa giwisuma ya. 21 eheth, dan ma pawa dennage atha ma langin ma mesaya matha thibe. 22 manda, manushya-puthrayano niyamitha gamana yana sek ma ya.
